title: S17 Ep1: TCT: The Conviction of Ghislane Maxwell
itunes:title: TCT: The Conviction of Ghislane Maxwell
description:
True Crime Tuesday presents The Conviction of Ghislane Maxwell with Dr. Carole Lieberman.

Ghislaine Maxwell was convicted of five of the six charges against her at the sex trafficking trial last week, capping an a stunning fall for the disgraced British socialite, who groomed underaged girls for financier Jeffrey Epstein to abuse while mingling with the rich and famous.

Dr. Lieberman Joins us to discuss the motives behind Maxwell's fall and why she believes Maxwell is not necessarily guilty of the charges against her.

Check out Dr. Carole Lieberman's website at expertwitnessforensicpsychiatrist.com

WARNING: The views of Dr. Lieberman are not the views of Darkness Radio, True Crime Tuesday or Stitcher...
